Class Bullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameObject
      • Bullet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnyGroup
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EnemyBullet, PlayerBullet

    public abstract class Bullet
extends GameObject
    A class that represents both enemy and friendly bullets. The bullets will vanish when they go outside the game borders.
    Version:
    1.0.
    Author:
    Mossad Helali.
